reviewText: Interesting collection, this. As the title implies, these are stories of beautiful but deadly females. NOTABLES: BLONDE ICE is a postwar film noir about a reporter who marries two wealthy men and murders them both. Ed Wood Jr. shocked the world in 1954 with his crossdressing semi-autobiographical film, "Glen or Glenda." Two years later, Wood scripted THE VIOLENT YEARS, a story of crossdressing juvenile delinquent GIRLS. Their odd little gang takes to robbing gas stations, raping young men at gunpoint and other anti-social acts. The newest title here, THE FIRING LINE, is a cheapo Philippine-made action film about a peroxided lady helicopter pilot engaged in jungle warfare. Laughable production values, bored-looking actors. SWAMP DIAMONDS is a Roger Corman quickie about a group of hard-edged female prison escapees. They hijack a boat and its wealthy owner and go deep into a swamp in search of a stash of hidden jewels. ST. CLAIR DVD multi-packs are reasonably priced, and offer fine quality video/audio transfers of unrestored public domain material. Discs are single-side recorded, plastic storage cases fairly sturdy, liner notes appear on box's back cover. BOMBSHELLS OF THE SILVER SCREEN 4 Movie Pack, from BRENTWOOD, features famous European actresses. . Parenthetical numbers preceding titles are 1 to 10 viewer poll ratings found at a film resource website. DISC ONE-- (2.3) Swamp Diamonds ("Swamp Women") (1955)- Marie Windsor/Beverly Garland/Mike Connors/Jonathan Haze/Ed Nelson (5.3) Ma Barker's Killer Brood (1960) - Lurene Tuttle/Tristam Coffin/Nelson Leigh/Don Grady (6.3) Dishonored Lady (1947) - Hedy Lamarr/Dennis O'Keefe/Natalie Schafer/Margaret Hamilton BONUS: Poster Gallery DISC TWO-- (2.9) The Firing Line (USA/Philippines-1991) - Reb Brown/Shannon Tweed/Mel Davidson (3.6) Millions (Italy/Spain-1991) - Billy Zane/Lauren Hutton/Carol Alt/John Stockwell/Donald Pleasence (1.3) Deadly Trigger ("Deadly Twins") (1985) - Audrey Landers/Judy Landers BONUS: Movie Trailers-- Bad Blonde Man Bait Slightly Scarlet The Postman Always Rings Twice DISC THREE-- (5.4) Blonde Ice (1948) - Robert Paige/Leslie Brooks/Russ Vincent/Michael Whalen (2.4) The Violent Years (1956) - Jean Morgan/Barbara Weeks/Arthur Millan/Glenn Corbett/L. Stanford Jolley (5.2) Club Paradise ("Sensation Hunters") (1945) - Robert Lowery/Doris Merrick/Eddie Quillan/Constance Worth/Wanda McKay/Minerva Urecal/Lyle Talbot (uncredited: John Hamilton) (5.6) The Great Flamarion (1945) - Erich von Stroheim/Mary Beth Hughes/Dan Duryea/Steve Barclay BONUS: Mary Beth Hughes Bio

St. Clair gets top production marks for this product. These are the type of movies that are excellent for their genre. If you are familiar with this genre you will not be disappointed not at this bargain price. The set includes 3 discs - Disc 1 - Swamp Diamonds, Ma Barker's Killer Brood, and Dishonored Lady. Disc 2 - Firing Line, Millions, and Deadly Trigger. Disc 3- Blonde Ice, The Violent Years, Club Paradise, and The Great Flamarion. Only Disc 2 is in colour - the remaining two discs are in Black and White.
